#### The symbols represent the total cost of a plant, upgrade, or expansion of a facility in rural Oregon. Use the sliders and check boxes to the left of the plot to narrow the range of plotted data. You must select “Regenerate Plot” after making a selection. Hover over the symbol to display the details of the project.
